# UITab.Placement.sidebarOnly

**Case**

The item only appears in the sidebar.

## Declaration

```swift
case sidebarOnly
```

## Placement values

- **UITab.Placement.automatic**: The system adds only top-level items to the tab bar, but people can add, remove, or move this item.
- **UITab.Placement.default**: The item appears in the tab bar, but people can move or remove it.
- **UITab.Placement.fixed**: The item appears in the tab bar’s leading edge, and people can’t move or remove it.
- **UITab.Placement.movable**: The item appears in the tab bar, people can move it but can’t remove it.
- **UITab.Placement.optional**: The item doesn’t appear in the tab bar, but people can add it and move it.
- **UITab.Placement.pinned**: The item appears as a pinned tab, on the trailing edge of the tab bar.
